alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, northeastern Anderson and southeastern Pickens Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Clemson, or 5 miles south of Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Easley, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Mauldin, Berea, Welcome, Powdersville, Piedmont and Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville
